meanings.definition: A group of anticonvulsant drugs used to treat seizures.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed phenytoins to control the seizures.
meanings.sent2: She takes phenytoins every day to manage her epilepsy.
meanings.sent3: The phenytoins danced in her medicine cabinet, ready to stop the seizures.
meanings.sent4: Like knights in shining armor, phenytoins protect against the seizure dragon.
meanings.sent5: The phenytoins stood guard, shielding her from the storm of seizures.
